timeline.bodyText: hmm, we should start naming them x y z w if people are really confused. the first three are multipliers on 3 imaginary components and the last one is the multiplier on the real component. I don't know why but these mappings lost again.
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,11 +1,14 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_1158 net/minecraft/util/math/Quaternion
 	FIELD field_21493 IDENTITY Lnet/minecraft/class_1158;
-	FIELD field_21585 a F
+	FIELD field_21582 a F
+	FIELD field_21583 b F
+	FIELD field_21584 c F
+	FIELD field_21585 d F

replies.bodyText: Yes, call them x, y, z, w please, that's what they're called.
replies.author: Earthcomputer

replies.bodyText: appears that some modders may agree with the xyzw names, such as CaffeineMC/sodium-fabric@fcfccc3#diff-807d8c9858c64d22dc8ed37a70b4280cR88-R91
replies.author: liach
